resources.string: Explore our selection of signature beverages, expertly crafted to elevate your coffee experience.

The CEO Latté is a bold, luxurious blend of rich espresso and creamy milk, perfectly designed for those who appreciate the finer things in life. Indulge in this sophisticated beverage thats as strong as it is smooth.
Buttercreme Latté delivers a velvety smooth taste with its sweet, buttery cream flavor fused into a classic latte base, offering a comforting, indulgent experience for anyone with a sweet tooth.

Our Spanish Latté offers a perfect balance of robust espresso and sweetened condensed milk, inspired by the traditional Spanish-style coffee. It’s a bold yet delightful choice for coffee enthusiasts who seek both flavor and strength.
The Gula Melaka is a rich, tropical delight that combines Southeast Asian palm sugar with creamy milk, creating a deliciously sweet yet earthy beverage thats both comforting and exotic.

A harmonious mix of rich brown sugar and a hint of sea salt that brings an unexpected but delightful contrast. Seasalt Brown Sugar is a sweet yet savory indulgence for those who crave complexity in their coffee.

Made with premium Australian chocolate, the Australian Chocolate beverage is a rich, indulgent iced treat that brings together the best of both worlds—sweet and satisfying, perfect for chocolate lovers.

Salted Caramel Latté is a perfect marriage of smooth caramel and a subtle touch of salt, providing a delightful contrast of sweet and savory flavors that will leave you craving more. A timeless classic with a twist.

The Matcha Craze is a refreshing and energizing beverage made with high-quality matcha, offering an earthy and rich flavor profile mixed with creamy milk. A perfect choice for green tea enthusiasts looking for something unique and refreshing.
